subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: In recent years, the team holding the top pick in the N.F.L. draft has tried to sign the player to a contract before the draft begins. This year isn’t so predictable.
snippet: In recent years, the team holding the top pick in the N.F.L. draft has tried to sign the player to a contract before the draft begins. This year isn’t so predictable.
